text: "It's Like That" is a song by American singer-songwriter Mariah Carey. It was released on January 25, 2005, as the first single from her ninth studio album, The Emancipation of Mimi. It samples "Hollis Groove (Kush Groove 2)" by Run-D.M.C., "This Is My Night" by Chaka Khan, and "La Di Da Di" by Doug E. Fresh and Slick Rick. The song reached the top five in the UK and the top 20 in the US, where it was her best-charting solo single in almost four years, after "Loverboy" (2001). It was certified gold in the US for shipping over 500,000 copies. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2005) Peak position Canada CHR/Pop Top 30 (Radio & Records) 8 Europe (European Hot 100 Singles) 8 Greece (IFPI) 12 Japan (Oricon) 130 Romania (Romanian Top 100) 57 US Hot Dance Singles Sales (Billboard) 1 US Pop 100 (Billboard) 20 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2005) Position Australia (ARIA) 60 Europe (European Hot 100 Singles) 97 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) 212 Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) 96 UK Singles (OCC) 71 US Billboard Hot 100 69 US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) 78 US Pop 100 (Billboard) 65 == References == == Notes == Category:Mariah Carey songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:R&B; songs Category:2005 songs
title: It's Like That
